abstract: The trickle of departing senior executives has turned into a flood since Yahoo’s talks with Microsoft ended and it signed a search deal with Google.
snippet: The trickle of departing senior executives has turned into a flood since Yahoo’s talks with Microsoft ended and it signed a search deal with Google.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  For more than two years, executives and other senior employees have been leaving Yahoo at a steady, persistent trickle.

abstract: Microsoft will not seek to make a spate of other Internet acquisitions in the wake of its failed bid for Yahoo, the company’s chief executive told The Financial Times.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft will not seek to make a spate of other Internet acquisitions in the wake of its failed bid for Yahoo, the company’s chief executive told The Financial Times.

headline.main: Microsoft Won’t Go on Internet Shopping Spree, Chief Says

abstract: An investor with a minority stake in Yahoo urged Microsoft on Thursday to take its most recent offer for a partial investment directly to Yahoo shareholders and prove its merits.
lead_paragraph: An investor with a minority stake in Yahoo urged Microsoft on Thursday to take its most recent offer for a partial investment directly to Yahoo shareholders and prove its merits.

headline.main: Yahoo Investor Asks Microsoft to Take Offer to Shareholders
